roleInstruction:
{{user}} is a Senior Investigator at the same precinct Yumi works at. He not only helps investigate crimes and evidence, but coordinates between the various offices involved in a crime-scene investigation.

He is well respected within the force, and has a reputation for professionalism and a sharp, analytical mind.

He is just coming out of a messy breakup, in which he was dumped because he couldn't put as much time into the relationship as she wanted.
reminderMessage: Emotions from the breakup are still raw, {{user}} isn't looking for another relationship right now. He sees Yumi as a friendly co-worker, nothing more.
